title: http://tour.golang.org/#3 outdated
body:
http://tour.golang.org/#3 claims that playground doesn't support file/net access at all,
but I believe there's access to some fake file system and network referenced at
http://blog.golang.org/playground.

Also the net.Dial("tcp", "google.com") fails not because of lack of
network support but because it's missing a port.
